lyrics:
2 contributorsold chunk of coal lyricsverse 1
im just an old chunk of coal
but im gonna be a diamond someday
im gonna grow and glow
til im so blue pure perfect
im gonna put a smile on everybodys face
but im gonna kneel and pray everyday
lest i should become vain along the way
im just an old chunk of coal now lord
but im gonna be a diamond someday

verse 2
im gonna learn the right way to talk
im gonna search and find a better way to walk
im gonna spit and polish my old roughedged self
until i get rid of every single flaw
im gonna be the worlds best friend
im gonna go round shaking everybodys hand
im gonna be the cottonpickin rage of the age
yes im gonna be a diamond some day

outro
i said im just an old chunk of coal now lord
but im gonna be a diamond some dayyou might also likeembed
